_description: Descriptions for elements missing in the database

patches.name: RemoteAddress
patches.description: Defines a remote IP address or range for Windows Firewall rules. Used within FirewallException to specify allowed/blocked remote addresses.

patches.name: MessageQueuePermission
patches.description: Sets access permissions on a message queue for a specific user or group. Allows controlling read, write, and admin access to MSMQ queues.

patches.name: AdminExecuteSequence
patches.description: Contains the sequence of actions for administrative installation (msiexec /a). Used to customize the admin install process for network deployment.

patches.name: AdminUISequence
patches.description: Contains the sequence of UI actions during administrative installation. Controls dialogs and user interaction during admin image creation.

patches.name: AdvertiseExecuteSequence
patches.description: Contains the sequence of actions for advertised installation. Used when features are advertised for install-on-demand scenarios.

patches.name: EmbeddedChainer
patches.description: Defines an embedded chainer for multiple package installation (MSI 4.5+). Allows chaining multiple MSI packages within a single transaction.

patches.name: EmbeddedUI
patches.description: Specifies a custom embedded UI DLL that replaces the standard Windows Installer UI. Allows fully customized installation experience.

patches.name: Error
patches.description: Defines custom error messages for the Error table. Associates error codes with localized message text shown during installation failures.

patches.name: InstallExecuteSequence
patches.description: Contains the main sequence of installation actions. Controls the order of file copying, registration, and all installation operations.

patches.name: InstallUISequence
patches.description: Contains the sequence of UI actions during normal installation. Controls dialog display order and user interaction during setup.

patches.name: ProgressText
patches.description: Defines progress text displayed during installation actions. Maps action names to user-friendly descriptions shown in the progress dialog.

patches.name: Publish
patches.description: Publishes a control event from a dialog control. Used to trigger actions like navigating dialogs, setting properties, or executing custom actions when users interact with UI controls.

patches.name: Show
patches.description: Controls the visibility and state of a dialog control based on conditions. Shows, hides, enables, or disables UI controls dynamically during installation.

patches.name: TextStyle
patches.description: Defines a text style for dialog controls. Specifies font name, size, color, and style (bold, italic) used by UI elements.

patches.name: UpgradeVersion
patches.description: Defines a version range for upgrade detection within an Upgrade element. Specifies which installed product versions trigger an upgrade.
